headline: 5 Financial Transaction Stocks to Watch Amid Resilient Consumer Spending
summary: The Financial Transaction Services industry is aided by the widespread uptake of digital payments, strong cross-border volumes and M&A initiatives. Companies like V, MA, FI, FIS and GPN are well-positioned to thrive on the back of these favorable trends.

headline: FIS Recognized for Outstanding Customer Satisfaction in IDC Treasury Awards
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., December 19, 2024--Global financial technology leader FIS® (NYSE: FIS) has been recognized by IDC, a leading global market intelligence firm, for its outstanding customer satisfaction (CSAT) in treasury management. This accolade is the company’s fourth award win in 2024 for excellence in treasury management.
